languages.text: "Да? Как иначе ты бы назвал{mf||а} то, чем мы занимаемся?" {n}Друкари прищуривает глаза.{/n} "Я обещал тебе показать свой мир. Утолить твой интерес. И я сделал это. Чья вина в том, что ты все еще остаешься мон-кай — с вашими притупленными чувствами и ограничивающей моралью, что вам вколачивают с младенчества?"

"Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"
languages.original_text: "Да? Как иначе ты бы назвал{mf||а} то, чем мы занимаемся?" {n}Друкари прищуривает глаза.{/n} "Я обещал тебе показать свой мир. Утолить твой интерес. И я сделал это. Чья вина в том, что ты все еще остаешься мон-кай — с вашими притупленными чувствами и ограничивающей моралью, что вам вколачивают с младенчества?"

traits.locale_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

"Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

"Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

"Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

languages.text: “是啊，不然该叫它什么呢？”{n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我答应让你见识我的世界，满足你的好奇心。我答应的一切都已经做到了，可你仍然还是原来的那只的猴子，仍然带着你自幼浸淫而来的迟钝感官与狭隘的道德，这一切是谁的错呢？”
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，不然该叫它什么呢？”{n}玛拉斋眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我答应让你见识我的世界，满足你的好奇心。我答应的一切都已经做到了，可你仍然还是原来的那只的猴子，仍然带着你自幼浸淫而来的迟钝感官与狭隘的道德，这一切是谁的错呢？”

languages.text: «Claro. ¿Qué otro nombre darías a lo que hacemos?». {n}Entorna los ojos.{/n} «Prometí mostrarte mi mundo, satisfacer tu curiosidad; y lo he hecho. ¿Quién tiene la culpa de que sigas siendo {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, con esos sentidos embotados y ese riguroso sentido de la moralidad que os inculcan desde niños?».
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: «Claro. ¿Qué otro nombre darías a lo que hacemos?». {n}Entorna los ojos.{/n} «Prometí mostrarte mi mundo, satisfacer tu curiosidad; y lo he hecho. ¿Quién tiene la culpa de que sigas siendo {mf|un|una} mon-keigh, con esos sentidos embotados y ese riguroso sentido de la moralidad que os inculcan desde niños?».

languages.text: « Oui ? Comment appelleriez-vous ce que nous faisons ensemble ? » {n}Il plisse des yeux avant de continuer :{/n} « Je vous ai promis de vous montrer mon univers, de satisfaire votre curiosité. Et j'ai tenu parole. Est-ce ma faute si vous restez un simple mon-keigh, avec des sens émoussés et une moralité étriquée qui vous a été instillée dès le plus jeune âge ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui ? Comment appelleriez-vous ce que nous faisons ensemble ? » {n}Il plisse des yeux avant de continuer :{/n} « Je vous ai promis de vous montrer mon univers, de satisfaire votre curiosité. Et j'ai tenu parole. Est-ce ma faute si vous restez un simple mon-keigh, avec des sens émoussés et une moralité étriquée qui vous a été instillée dès le plus jeune âge ? »

languages.text: "Ja? Wie würdet Ihr denn nennen, was wir tun?" {n}Er kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe versprochen, Euch meine Welt zu zeigen, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen – und das habe ich getan. Wessen Schuld ist es, wenn Ihr im Kern trotzdem nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey bleibt – mit Euren abgestumpften Sinnen und Eurer engstirnigen Moral, die Ihr seit Eurer Kindheit eingetrichtert bekamt?"
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja? Wie würdet Ihr denn nennen, was wir tun?" {n}Er kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe versprochen, Euch meine Welt zu zeigen, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen – und das habe ich getan. Wessen Schuld ist es, wenn Ihr im Kern trotzdem nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey bleibt – mit Euren abgestumpften Sinnen und Eurer engstirnigen Moral, die Ihr seit Eurer Kindheit eingetrichtert bekamt?

languages.text: 「そうだろう？他に俺達のやっていることを何と呼ぶ？」{n}彼は目を細める。{/n}「俺はお前に世界を見せ、その好奇心を満たしてやると約束し…そして俺はそれを果たした。にもかかわらず、お前が変わらずにモン＝ケイでい続けているのは誰のせいだ？その鈍い感覚と、幼少期から染み付いた狭量な道徳観のせいか？」
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだろう？他に俺達のやっていることを何と呼ぶ？」{n}彼は目を細める。{/n}「俺はお前に世界を見せ、その好奇心を満たしてやると約束し…そして俺はそれを果たした。にもかかわらず、お前が変わらずにモン＝ケイでい続けているのは誰のせいだ？その鈍い感覚と、幼少期から染み付いた狭量な道徳観のせいか？」

languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

languages.text: "Evet? Sen bu yaptıklarımıza başka ne derdin?" {n}Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Sana dünyamı göstermeye, merakını gidermeye söz verdim ve... Sözümü tuttum. Doğduğun andan itibaren içine düştüğün o körleşmiş hislerin ve dar görüşlü ahlak anlayışınla hâlâ mon-keigh ruhunu koruman kimin kabahati?"
languages.original_text: "Yes? What else would you call what we do?" {n}He narrows his eyes.{/n} "I promised to show you my world, to satisfy your curiosity — and I have. Whose fault is it that you remain a mon-keigh nevertheless — with your dulled senses and narrow morality that you have been steeped in since infancy?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet? Sen bu yaptıklarımıza başka ne derdin?" {n}Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Sana dünyamı göstermeye, merakını gidermeye söz verdim ve... Sözümü tuttum. Doğduğun andan itibaren içine düştüğün o körleşmiş hislerin ve dar görüşlü ahlak anlayışınla hâlâ mon-keigh ruhunu koruman kimin kabahati?"
